misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni is a highly accomplished golfer and a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, having participated in every edition since 2022.  Hailing from Hirsala Golf, Toni's contributions to the tournament extend far beyond his impressive playing record; he is, in fact, one of the primary organizers of this prestigious event.

His dedication and passion for the Hector Trophée are evident not only in his organizational role but also in his consistently strong performances. Toni has proven himself a formidable competitor, claiming victory in the prestigious Hector Trophée itself on three separate occasions: in Hector Trophée II, IV, and V.  Furthermore, his individual skill has also been rewarded, earning him the coveted Victor trophy in both 2021 and 2024.

Toni's consistent presence and success at the Hector Trophée make him a player to watch each year. His deep understanding of the tournament, combined with his exceptional golfing talent, positions him as a perennial contender for both the team and individual titles. We look forward to seeing Toni continue to make his mark on the Hector Trophée for many years to come.
